title: West Indies in Pakistan 2018 Scoreboard

persons.name: hussain talat run out chadwick walton
fakhar zaman run out veerasammy permaul

text: April 1, 2018 / 6:06 PM / Updated 11 hours ago West Indies in Pakistan 2018 Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Apr 1 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play of 1st twenty20 between Pakistan and West Indies on Sunday at Karachi, Pakistan Pakistan win by 143 runs Pakistan 1st innings Fakhar Zaman Run Out Veerasammy Permaul 39 Babar Azam lbw Rayad Emrit 17 Hussain Talat Run Out Chadwick Walton 41 Sarfraz Ahmed c Andre Fletcher b Rovman Powell 38 Shoaib Malik Not Out 37 Asif Ali b Keemo Paul 1 Faheem Ashraf Not Out 16 Extras 0b 6lb 1nb 0pen 7w 14 Total (20.0 overs) 203-5 Fall of Wickets : 1-46 Azam, 2-65 Zaman, 3-140 Talat, 4-150 Ahmed, 5-156 Ali Did Not Bat : Nawaz, Khan, Amir, Ali Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Samuel Badree 4 0 37 0 9.25 1w Keemo Paul 4 0 26 1 6.50 1nb Rayad Emrit 4 0 43 1 10.75 Kesrick Williams 4 0 42 0 10.50 Veerasammy Permaul 0.3 0 8 0 16.00 2w Marlon Samuels 0.3 0 7 0 14.00 Rovman Powell 3 0 34 1 11.33 West Indies 1st innings Chadwick Walton c Asif Ali b Mohammad Nawaz 6 Andre Fletcher c Hussain Talat b Mohammad Amir 0 Marlon Samuels c Faheem Ashraf b Mohammad Nawaz 18 Jason Mohammed c Hussain Talat b Mohammad Amir 0 Denesh Ramdin c Mohammad Nawaz b Hasan Ali 0 Rovman Powell c&b Shadab Khan 5 Keemo Paul Not Out 10 Rayad Emrit c Hussain Talat b Shoaib Malik 11 Kesrick Williams c Babar Azam b Shoaib Malik 0 Samuel Badree c Shoaib Malik b Hussain Talat 7 Extras 0b 0lb 0nb 0pen 3w 3 Total (13.4 overs) 60 all out Fall of Wickets : 1-6 Walton, 2-8 Fletcher, 3-8 Mohammed, 4-15 Ramdin, 5-27 Powell, 6-33 Samuels, 7-51 Emrit, 8-51 Williams, 9-60 Badree Did Not Bat : Permaul Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Mohammad Nawaz 4 0 19 2 4.75 1w Mohammad Amir 2 0 3 2 1.50 2w Hasan Ali 1 1 0 1 0.00 Faheem Ashraf 1 0 9 0 9.00 Shadab Khan 3 0 13 1 4.33 Shoaib Malik 2 0 13 2 6.50 Hussain Talat 0.4 0 3 1 4.50 Umpire Shozab Raza Umpire Ahsan Raza Video Ahmed Shahab Match Referee David Boon
